review.description: An interesting attempt at a 007 style mod. Has a single level, but the mod itself is largely unfinished. Art design is poor, level design is decent.

review.description: A shining example of an excellent total conversion for Duke Nukem. All-around interesting and terrific level, weapon and enemy design. Definitely worth playing.
